Package com.sympos2.repositories

Interface ComentarioRepository

All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Comentario,String>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListCrudRepository<Comentario,String>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListPagingAndSortingRepository<Comentario,String>, org.springframework.data.mongodb.repository.MongoRepository<Comentario,String>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<Comentario,String>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<Comentario>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<Comentario,String>
public interface ComentarioRepository extends org.springframework.data.mongodb.repository.MongoRepository<Comentario,String>
This interface manages Comentario objects from Database.
Version:
0.1.0
Author:
KurixDeCuatroCuernos

  • Method Details

    • findById

      Optional<Comentario> findById(String id)
      This method finds a Comentario object in database by its Id.
      Specified by:
      findById in interface org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Comentario,String>
      Parameters:
      id - String with the Id which will be compared to found the work.
      Returns:
      returns an Optional object, filled with a Comentario object if it founds the comment in database, or an empty Optional if not.

    • findByObraAndUsuario

      Optional<Comentario> findByObraAndUsuario(Long obra, String usuario)
      This method finds a Comentario object in database by the work and user related.
      Parameters:
      obra - Long with the id of the Work which the comment to find comments.
      usuario - String with the id of the user who created the comment to find
      Returns:
      returns an Optional object, filled with a Comentario object if it founds the comment in database, or an empty Optional if not.

    • findByUsuarioAndTipo

      Optional<RespuestaComentario> findByUsuarioAndTipo(String usuario, String tipo)
      This method finds a Comentario object in database by the user who created it and the type of the comment (Comment or Answer).
      Parameters:
      usuario - String with the id of the user who created the comment to find.
      tipo - String with the type of the comment to find.
      Returns:
      returns an Optional object, filled with a Comentario object if it founds the comment in database, or an empty Optional if not.

    • findAllByComment

      List<Comentario> findAllByComment(String comment)
      This method finds all the Comentario objects in database by the comment which answers.
      Parameters:
      comment - String with the comment's id to find the answers related.
      Returns:
      returns a List of Comentario object, filled with a Comentario objects if founds one or more, or an empty Optional if not.

    • findAllByObra

      List<Comentario> findAllByObra(Long obra)
      This method finds all the Comentario objects in database by the Obra object it comments.
      Parameters:
      obra - Long with the isbn of the Work that the comment comments.
      Returns:
      returns a List of Comentario object, filled with a Comentario objects if founds one or more, or an empty List if not.

    • findAllByObraAndTipo

      List<Comentario> findAllByObraAndTipo(Long obra, String tipo, org.springframework.data.domain.Sort sort)
      This method finds all the Comentario objects in database by the Obra object it comments and the type of the comments ("COMMENT" or "ANSWER"), and order the results by a Sort object.
      Parameters:
      obra - Long with the isbn of the Work that the comment comments.
      tipo - String with the type of the comment to find (COMMENT or ANSWER).
      sort - Sort to order the received data.
      Returns:
      returns a sorted List of Comentario object, filled with a Comentario objects if founds one or more, or an empty List if not.

    • findAllByObraAndTipoAndComment

      List<Comentario> findAllByObraAndTipoAndComment(Long obra, String tipo, String comment, org.springframework.data.domain.Sort sort)
      This method finds all the Comentario objects in database by the Obra object it comments, its type, the comment it comments, because is an Answer, and sorts the results by a Sort object.
      Parameters:
      obra - Long with the isbn of the Work that the comment comments.
      tipo - String with the type of the comment to find (COMMENT or ANSWER).
      comment - String with the comment that the Comentario object comments (because is an Answer).
      sort - Sort to order the received data.
      Returns:
      returns a sorted List of Comentario object, filled with a Comentario objects if founds one or more, or an empty List if not.

    • findAllByUsuario

      List<Comentario> findAllByUsuario(String usuario)
      This method finds all the Comentario objects in database by the user who created it.
      Parameters:
      usuario - String with the id of the user who created the comment to find.
      Returns:
      returns a List of Comentario object, filled with a Comentario objects if founds one or more, or an empty List if not.

    • findAllByObraAndUsuario

      List<Comentario> findAllByObraAndUsuario(Long obra, String usuario)
      This method finds all the Comentario objects in database by the user who created it and the Obra object which comments.
      Parameters:
      obra - Long with the isbn of the Work that the comment comments.
      usuario - String with the id of the user who created the comment to find.
      Returns:
      returns a List of Comentario object, filled with a Comentario objects if founds one or more, or an empty List if not.

      List<Comentario> findAllByTipo(String tipo)
      This method finds all the Comentario objects in database by its type (COMMENT or ANSWER).
      Parameters:
      tipo - String with the type of the comment to find (COMMENT or ANSWER).
      Returns:
      returns a List of Comentario object, filled with a Comentario objects if founds one or more, or an empty List if not.

    • findAllOrderByFecha

      List<Comentario> findAllOrderByFecha()
      This method finds all the Comentario objects in database sorting its results by fecha parameter.
      Returns:
      returns a sorted List of Comentario object, filled with a Comentario objects if founds one or more, or an empty List if not.

    • findNewestCommentByFechaAndTipo

      @Query(value="{}", sort="{\'fecha\': -1}") List<Comentario> findNewestCommentByFechaAndTipo(String tipo)
      This method finds all Comentario objects in database by its type and sorting it by fecha parameter.
      Parameters:
      tipo - String with the type of the comment to find (COMMENT or ANSWER).
      Returns:
      returns a sorted List of Comentario object, filled with a Comentario objects if founds one or more, or an empty List if not.

    • findAllByObraOnlyComment

      @Query(value="{ \'obra\' : ?0, \'tipo\' : \'COMMENT\' }", fields="{ \'valoracion\' : 1 }") List<Comentario> findAllByObraOnlyComment(Long obra)
      This method finds all the Comentario objects of the type "COMMENT" in database by the Obra object which comments. And only shows the Valoracion parameter.
      Parameters:
      obra - Long with the isbn of the Work that the comment comments.
      Returns:
      returns a List of Comentario object, filled with a Comentario objects, but only its valoracion parameter, if founds one or more in database, or an empty List if not.

    • findAllParams

      @Query("{ \'$or\': [ { \'$expr\': { \'$regexMatch\': { \'input\': { \'$toString\': \'$_id\' }, \'regex\': ?0, \'options\': \'i\' } } }, { \'titulo\': { \'$regex\': ?0, \'$options\': \'i\' } }, { \'texto\': { \'$regex\': ?0, \'$options\': \'i\' } }, { \'tipo\': { \'$regex\': ?0, \'$options\': \'i\' } }, { \'usuario\': { \'$regex\': ?0, \'$options\': \'i\' } }, { \'comment\': { \'$regex\': ?0, \'$options\': \'i\' } }, { \'obra\': { \'$regex\': ?0, \'$options\': \'i\' } }, { \'$expr\': { \'$regexMatch\': { \'input\': { \'$toString\': \'$fecha\' }, \'regex\': ?0, \'options\': \'i\' } } }] }") List<Comentario> findAllParams(String search)
      This method finds all the Comentario objects in database by any coincidence with the String.
      Parameters:
      search - String with a text to find any coincidence in the database.
      Returns:
      returns a List of Comentario object, filled with a Comentario objects if founds one or more, or an empty List if not.
